content.rendered:
• Customer Reviews: 
    4.6 out of 5 stars  675 global ratings

excerpt.rendered: This easy-to-take liquid formula provides you with a high-potency source of the B vitamins riboflavin, niacin, B-6, B-12 and pantothenic acid and it tastes great. The B vitamins are important for energy metabolism and nervous system health.
